p: Beyond triggering ER stress and UPR, viruses have evolved different strategies to subvert these cellular responses for their own benefit, e.g., enhancing replication, persisting in infected cells, and evading immune responses, as described for several viral families, such as Flav i-, Herpes-, and Togaviridae (reviewed by Ambrose and Mackenzie, 2011; Green et al., 2014; Li et al., 2015).
